snippet.textDisplay: I get it. Burnout's a bitch, and it's better to stop before the flames completely singe out. DBZA's gone through so many ringers as it is, it makes sense to quit forcing yourself onto a project that, in a sense, is a ticking time bomb, especially with how YouTube's policies have been as of late (cheap shot, but don't care). All cards on the table, DBZA is why I stuck around as long as I did. Should y'all consider coming back to it after a long rest and getting everything back together, I will come flocking back with open arms. Until then, or if it never comes to pass regardless, good luck on your other projects. It's been a good ride.

snippet.textDisplay:
Burnout is real. "Start hating what you love" is pretty damn accurate. It's kinda funny how ending after Cell is what happened to Dbz Kai as well. (Granted, they finally did get to the Buu saga.)

I wondered this when you said you couldn't do Bojack: it doesn't have to be the ENTIRE series, but is there any possibility of just partial dubbing or "best ofs" from the Buu Saga? Maybe even simply your own Kai version. I feel there may be some way to compromise and get the best out there. Not a necessity, just a possibility.

Even so, again, I've loved your work, and just Dragonball, but Attack on Titan, Final Fantasy, even the Digimon april fools one-off 😂.
The Cell Saga finale happened when I was going through some VERY troubling stuff, and you managed to stick the landing and beat out your burn out. I tip my hat to everyone who worked on this series.

snippet.textDisplay:
The ending is quite comprehensible, but I'm sad and here's a list of the golden moments we were expecting and we won't have on DBZA
- King Kai still yelling at Goku
- Gohan as a shy teenager yet getting the girls wet
- The meaning of Goten's name
- Piccolo grunting for babysitting the new saiyan generation
- A joke about how they always keep watching instead of do something when Videl gets destroyed by Spopovich
- Krilin did 18 and managed to marry her
- In Bojack movie, future Trunks shutting Tien's mouth with one punch
- They all refering to the SS2 as the 'super dooper saiyan'
- Dende hating Videl
- The moment kid Trunks transforms into a super saiyan in front of Vegeta and says 'see dad, you're not dealing with the average saiyan warrior anymore' and Vegeta having the same proud crying face as Goku when Gohan transformed
- Goku biting Boo
- And of course, the peak moment... 'Good bye Trunks, Bulma, and you, best buddy'

Damn guys, i hadn't noticed all the moments I was expecting. Im not gonna lie, this makes me really sad. However, we will always be thankful for this masterpiece you created, one of the greatest jewels in youtube. Farewell, my friends.

snippet.textDisplay:
I love DBZA. And you guys said this was the right business and personal decision and I understand your stresses and burnout. And I understand you guys have a lot of projects you’re working on.

But...and there is always a but...DBZA is and always has been, the core of this channel. All those jobs, views, and everything else was built off of it. Without it...I can’t see it all standing up on its own long term. It’s the core that everything spirals off of. It’ll feel empty without the anticipation of a new episode or season.

snippet.textDisplay:
Alright, now that I've calmed down. Here's what I want all of you at TeamFourStar to read.

It is okay. I and everyone will be fine. You will be fine. What we had was dragonball as a series. What you then gave us was much more than that. You gave us a community, you gave us friends, you gave us family sometimes. DragonBall Z abridged is something that will inevitably go down in history as the greatest revamp of a series ever. You should be so proud that you got this far. You should be proud at the fact that you gave everyone a boost. In whatever way that may have come.

Of course, I hope that in the future it will return. But if I'm being completely honest. And I am, I love you guys too much to not be. If it doesn't return, this is the best place to leave it at. Everything was tied neatly into a little bow and sprinkled with love and affection to such a degree that every single dragonball fan could enjoy it. Hell, even non dragonball fans.

I love you guys. You gave me something unforgettable. And for that I will be eternally grateful. God I'm tearing up again XD.
Thank you, from the deepest and most illustrious pits of my heart. You will forever be a part of my life. And I will never, in all of eternity, regret that. You are special. And I hope that I've said everything I can to make you know that. I will see you on the next endeavor you guys will bring to the table.
Final note, I need to say that mere words are by no means ever enough to describe the love I feel for DBZA and you who made it.
With all this in mind. Have a great career and live. I will be there at the next stop you make on the way. The next series, the next project, I will be there.

snippet.textDisplay: I got pretty sad when I saw the title, but seeing how you guys are made cry "Like a Bitch". DBZA became one of my most watched and most fun show to watch in the last five years since I first discovered, it's truly a shame it had to end so suddenly. But I gotta say, you guys have improved so much during the whole series and made such a good work overall on the run, that it's already a masterpiece on its own. I honestly think you guys even managed to improve some moments and dialogs at the end, compared to the dubs and even the original story, N°16's speech to Gohan, Trunks and Vegeta's relationship, and Pissed-off Gohan's behavior were some of the highlights for me, there were moments when your version managed to better convey the characters fellings and motivations in a much more relatable way. You guys were awesome! Congratulations for going this far. Shout outs to Kaiser for the ever improving of the screenwriting and edition, to Lannipator for the unforgettable performances as Krillin, Piccolo and Vegeta (all my favorite characters), for Takahata01, for the best voice acting in my opinion as both Nappa and Cell, and to MasakoX for the excelente take on both Goku and Gohan personality and that very emotional moment when Goku goes "Well, guess I should go clean up my mess, Huh?" Until tha last " Bye son"...That caught so off-guard because of the overall tone of the show, that even I who watched all DBZ at least half a dozen times, it still made me cry.

snippet.textDisplay:
No words can put into perspective just how enjoyable DBZA was to watch, and to see it grow from strength-to-strength is a testament to the amount of creativity, passion, and love above all, that you all as bona fide fans put into it, encapsulated the whole feel of the show and made it one of the most enjoyable and memorable pieces of internet-consumable media on the planet.

Given the constant threats of copyright strikes, it feels natural that you've made the hard decision to call time on the project. You may have promised Season 4, but you've ended it on your own terms, and that's always the right decision.



Thank you so much for these past dozen years of hard work and dedication. Best of luck in all you do going forward!

snippet.textDisplay: Bahahaha.  I know the reason you guys are subscribed to team four star is mainly dbza...but we couldnt really concentrate on it bc we had other side projects coming out twice a year that never had follow up episodes.  And also we have employees now that were struggling to pay for some reason.  We keep coming up with new projects and abandoning them after 2 episodes...so we decided the best thing to do is abandon/cancel dbza (the only reason we make money on youtube) so we have more time to start and abandon other projects.  Sorry guys it's the only business decision that made sense.  Please stay subscribed and donate to our patreon lol.

snippet.textDisplay: Okay, ik no one is gonna really pay attention to this. Plus I’m buzzed so please understand I truly mean this. Watching DBZA isn’t even the same anymore. Like obviously it’s still hilarious and amazing but knowing that it’s over it just. It hurts to want to laugh at it. We under stand as fans that obviously it takes time to make the best stuff possibly. But understand that we were willing to wait YEARS until you guys were fully prepared to published because this doesn’t feel like the end. You guys gave me personally the most amazing experience of my life. This got me through so much. Honestly. If you had to say screw bojack, then screw bojack. We were willing to skip it. You guys were my childhood. My teen years. And my adulthood and honestly I want to shed tears (and honestly I am rn) because you. Are the true DBZ. Not DBZA but DBZ. because you guys got it right and I love you guys so much. For giving me so many laughs and so many happy moments to throughout my life I honestly couldn’t possibly thank you guys enough. And I know you probably won’t see this cause I’m 1 commoner among thousands but truly. Even if it took you guys years to get this down. We. As your fans. Would be willing to wait. Because DBZA is not only one of the best versions of dragon ball that we’ve ever seen. But if gave us something to keep looking forward to. And to know that it’s over, breaks my heart more than you could ever know because DBZA means so much to me and I hope that you guys could just take a breather and come back and finish this amazing masterpiece that you have created. But I get that that’s unliked but just know. You guys are amazing. And even though I don’t go through the other content cause I didn’t watch the show or play the game. You are amazing. I love you guys and truly. You all, and your show, are one of the best things that’s ever happened to me.
